uuid.description: Unique Universal Identifier (UUID) of the project

title.description: Title or name of the project

hash_tag_ids.description: List of hash tag IDs linked to the project

last_date.description: Last date related to the project

tentative.description: Indicator whether the project is tentative or confirmed

likelihood.description: Likelihood or probability assessment of project success

billing_model.description: The billing model used for the project

hour_rate_source.description: Source of the hourly rate for the project

customer_id.description: Unique ID of the customer associated with the project

currency_rate.description: Exchange rate of the project's currency

project_group_id.description: Group ID to which the project belongs

color.description: Color code associated with the project

description.description: Description or summary of the project

assigned_manager_ids.description: List of unique IDs representing managers assigned to the project

assigned_manager_readonly_ids.description: List of unique IDs for assigned managers with read-only access to the project

is_public.description: Indicator whether the project is public or not

integrations.description: List of integrations or APIs linked to the project

custom_attributes.description: Additional custom attributes or information related to the project
